DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of KCT-0809 compared to placebo in patients with dry eye syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study of KCT-0809 in Patients With Dry Eye Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Corneal and conjunctival damage Insufficiency of lacrimal secretion Ocular symptom Severe ophthalmic disorder Punctual plugs or surgery for occlusion of the lacrimal puncta
